The spirit of man, or, Some meditations (by way of essay) on the sense of that scripture, 1 Thes. 1:23 ... by Charles Morton ... Morton, Charles, 1627-1698. Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728. Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.

Printed by B. Harris for Duncan Campbell ..., Boston : 1692.
